title: Two Things That Destroy Forward Progress, with Andy Frisella - MFCEO66
description: There are two things in life that utterly destroy your forward progress. The first is holding on to your past victories.  The second is the mentality that says “I will just show up to work and do the bare minimum.”  In this episode, Andy Frisella explains why these two things will kill your success—and what you need to do to rid them from your life.
